tool.name: Gdal_Dem
tool.description: Tools to analyze and visualize DEMs.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_Result $output_data_Result name Gdal_Dem InputDSN '$InputDSN' OutputDSN '$OutputDSN' utility '$utility' s '$s' co '$co' prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: InputDSN
param.label: The input data source name
param.help: The input data source name to use.

param.name: utility
param.label: The mode
param.help: This service has 7 different modes : hillshade, slope, aspect, color-relief, TRI, TPI, roughness

param.name: s
param.label: The scale
param.help: Scale is the ratio of vertical units to horizontal, for Feet:Latlong use 370400, for Meters:LatLong use 111120

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
